query:
SELECT po.id, po.customerOrderNumber, po.status, poi.productId, p.sku, p.description, poi.requestedQuantity 
FROM picking_orders po 
JOIN picking_order_items poi ON po.id = poi.pickingOrderId 
JOIN products p ON poi.productId = p.id 
WHERE po.customerOrderNumber = 'PED-005';
